technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Breast tissue shows well-defined lesion measuring 28.38 mm.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 34.48 bpm.
Right kidney demonstrates enlarged, no hydronephrosis.
Liver appears well-defined with no focal lesions.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Gallbladder shows smooth-walled, no stones or wall thickening.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
